about_description: Juan Pablo Jiménez, frontend developer, with expertise in TypeScript, Next.js, and React, constantly exploring new tools, CMS platforms, and best practices to stay ahead in front-end development. For me, learning is not just a necessity—it’s a passion that drives me to create innovative, efficient, and positive impactful digital experiences.
about_me: I'm Juan Pablo Jiménez, frontend developer passionate about blending technical precision with artistic creativity. I graduated in Systems and Computer Engineering from UPB in Medellín, Colombia, where I learned that software development is not only technical but also an art.
about_me_2: My interests include coding, problem-solving, visual design, music, and content creation. I enjoy transforming ideas into real-world solutions, ensuring each project follows agile methodologies, iterative improvements, open communication, and clean architectural practices.
skills: I specialize in TypeScript, Next.js, and React, constantly exploring new tools, CMS platforms, and best practices to stay ahead in front-end development. For me, learning is not just a necessity—it’s a passion that drives me to create innovative, efficient, and positive impactful digital experiences.
